guide.introduction:
Adapted from the original project by Howtoons on Instructables.

Mini marshmallows shot at high speeds can smack hard and even stick. These goggles will keep the fast-flying ’mallows from hitting your eyes and face.

NOTE: These goggles are intended for use with the Marshmallow Shooter to protect you from flying marshmallows. They are by no means intended to replace actual safety goggles in the workshop.

Adapted from the original project by Howtoons on Instructables.

Mini marshmallows shot at high speeds can smack hard and even stick. These goggles will keep the fast-flying ’mallows from hitting your eyes and face.

NOTE: These goggles are intended for use with the Marshmallow Shooter to protect you from flying marshmallows. They are by no means intended to replace actual safety goggles in the workshop.

Relevant parts
  • Soda bottle
  • Elastic band
Tools
  • Marker
  • Scissors

parts.notes: such as a large rubber band or a strip cut from an inner tube

lines.text: Rip off the bottle’s label, then cut off the top and bottom of the bottle.
lines.text_raw: Rip off the bottle’s label, then cut off the top and bottom of the bottle.

lines.text: Carefully cut down the middle  of the bottle, to make it a sheet  of plastic.
lines.text_raw: Carefully cut down the middle  of the bottle, to make it a sheet  of plastic.

lines.text: Wrap the sheet around your or someone else’s face, and use a marker to outline and design your mask.
lines.text_raw: Wrap the sheet around your or someone else’s face, and use a marker to outline and design your mask.

lines.text: Cut 2 slits in each corner of the mask, and weave each end of the elastic band through the slits, going out of the inner slit to the front side, then back in through the outer slit. Adjust your mask, and it’s ready to wear.
